NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Property Management and Interest Rates or the cell corresponding to Construction and Inventory?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Construction} and {Inventory} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Land and Inventory or the cell corresponding to Commercial and Market Trends?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Mortgages and Age or the cell corresponding to Residential and Age?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Property Management and Age or the cell corresponding to Commercial and Location?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Commercial} and {Location} has a higher heat value.
